author: julianfoad
msg: Simplify the regression tests for autoprops.
This makes these tests a bit faster too.
(check_proplist): Check property values as well as their names.  Simplify.
(autoprops_test): Use the extended 'check_proplist' instead of both

author: julianfoad
msg: Simplify code in 'import_dir' by using a library function.
Call svn_io_get_dirents instead of doing the hard work manually.

author: ehu
msg: Make public API consistently return svn_error_t's. Also move
svn_io_read_length_line() from hash.c to io.c; it's already
apr_status_t to svn_error_t *. Change implementation to use svn_io_file_*.
Changed to use svn_io_file_getc as well as return svn_error_t *.
Adapted to new return value type of svn_hash_read and svn_hash_write.
Adapted to new return value type of svn_hash_read and svn_hash_write.

author: blair
msg: Grammar fix: s/a intermediate commit/an intermediate commit/.
